definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: Suva , on the island of Viti Levu , is the capital.
sentences.chinese: 在維提島上的蘇瓦是首都。

sentences.english: Downtown Suva, Viti Levu Island, Republic of Fiji.
sentences.chinese: 蘇瓦的市區，維提島，斐濟共和國。

sentences.english: Commuters wait for buses at a central transport depot in Suva November 29, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 在斐濟首都蘇瓦，通勤者在中央車站等公車。
